column5:
This is where I fear I‚Äôll be. But I have always joke with my buds, all guys, I‚Äôll just shave it and wear my beauty as is. Who said a woman can‚Äôt look beautiful without hair. I know it would look weird, make my face look flatter, my jawline more round, but so what? I have a biological time clock I can‚Äôt control. And if I feel like wearing a wig I can‚Äîa colorful one at that. I can get the beautiful baby blue hair I always wanted without dying a single strain-ha. 

But that was all just talk. I‚Äôm still a long way from that. I hope you will come to feel beautiful as beauty comes from within. Smile and show your lovely personality and people will like you as you are!! May love and light be bestow upon u!!
Thanks üòä

At this point, I would just stop talking. Usually, this happens with my siblings and we don‚Äôt mind. It‚Äôs like an inside thing. But when friends, stranger, or other people are doing it‚Äîit‚Äôs a strong sign of disinterest. I knew a girl who would sometimes do this. She‚Äôs the kind of people that can weave her way into a group. She knows pretty much someone from each department. She‚Äôs a natural speaker and a natural people person. She doesn‚Äôt do it to hurt people or ignore them‚Äîit is a natural habit of her. It‚Äôs like her mind is running a race against time and I have to chase her and tell her to slow down and just pay attention for a moment. I try to play it cool with her, but I know it can be annoying if I stop her too often so I don‚Äôt unless I have to. She‚Äôs the type of people who can do it to you, but you can‚Äôt do it back if you‚Äôre too stiff as it can be taken as offensive.

Sounds like me. Some people r very dominant especially in group setting, their comments become loud and strong. It‚Äôs like an alpha, beta, and omega setting. 

But for sure, these people do pay attention. They will notice the different energy. People r more sensitive than they make themselves to be.

That‚Äôs my fear and so I don‚Äôt. I walk around confidently and mind my business when I started my new job. It got to the point coworkers asked if I came from a different branch. I smiled and told them no and asked why they think that. 

Sometimes, I guess you should be yourself. Don‚Äôt beat yourself over for not interacting. Let it flow naturally. I‚Äôm pretty stiff in personal interaction with people I don‚Äôt really know, so if I don‚Äôt have any I feel is worthy to say I just don‚Äôt. I sit back and listen. People have told me I am quiet and why I don‚Äôt say anything.

You‚Äôre gonna have to explain what you mean by being heard. Are you talking about speaking and people responding? Or people actually listening to your message, your needs, and such? 

I hope the rest of the comments help answer your question. Everyone have wrote very informative and amazing insights!!!üòÄ
I agree.

Maybe that would be me too. Just a tiny one. I think I have social anxiety too but was never diagnose. I blend in well. People would notice I am extremely quiet and is even quieter in group setting or discussion, but this does not affect too much my ability to provide professional customer service or professional interaction with coworker.

It‚Äôs not the job. I used to work for restaurants and now run a small cleaning business which I kinda hate too, but it pays the bill. It‚Äôs the knowing that I work 5 out of 7 days in a week and yet I can‚Äôt rent a place just for me and still save. I can‚Äôt afford to travel. I could only take two weeks out of a year for vacation, even then I can‚Äôt afford a vacation. I work so hard and yet I can‚Äôt even see it possible for me to buy my own house. 

So you see‚Äîit‚Äôs more than just a 9-5 thing. It‚Äôs the know that I‚Äôm swimming very hard to get to the other side but I‚Äôm not moving much at all. Going to work a job I don‚Äôt care much for‚Äîthat makes it a whole lot worse. It‚Äôs the people you work with that makes your job bearable‚Äîbut if they r horrible; good luck my friend. I wish the best for u.

Dang‚Äîyou‚Äôre just going. Sorry I can‚Äôt help. 

Keep up the good work!

Take a deep breath and meditate. Make a list of the good things about you and what you deserve. 

Sometimes we just have to accept the fact that we will lose friends. I look up to inspiration quotes such as ‚Äúwhen one door closes another one opens up‚Äù ‚Äú people come and go, but the right ones always stay‚Äù and so on‚Äîfind your own inspiration quotes. 

If it hurts very bad, it‚Äôs okay to cry. Okay to ask yourself why. Okay to ponder. But after all that, slowly walk away. Know that they no longer matter. There r better things to do and you deserve better. You want to focus on the things that will make positive change and let the anger and pain slowly heal.
They follow because they definitely want her to join them. She is one of them by blood. Nonetheless, she has been raised in Saram‚Äôs society. Unless it is a must, I don‚Äôt see her leaving.

No. There are very few people they would be looking for. They kept away from Arthdal society and many confrontations. They can never be bad ass‚Äîthere are only five (plus the female) you see. Which is why I am very curious. But it just baffles me that 99% of their kind were killed. Sounds impossible. It was a war that last 15 years. Won‚Äôt u ever think that a war that last over 10 years would create enough grudge for them to plot a kill on Arthdal‚Äôs mainland? If the Arthdal eats them, I would understand‚Äîbut too kill them just for it, I am sure the Neathel also understand grudge and anger. Perhaps, what if they found a colony of survivors? Hey‚Äîwe can see the comeback of Neathel!! 

I read somewhere that Yangcha was born a mute.

Never used drugs in my life and I feel I am also losing memories and my writing ability. I think it is more to do with the technology age and the things we don‚Äôt often do. We have to also consider the stuff put into our food and water supplies. So many other factors!!

I think at the end of her life she was hallucinating. Asa Hon died from physical over exhaustion and probably infection in her feet.

When the Arthdal people came down, they built the bridge. When Asa Hon came, she had to walk through all those hot and boiling sand. 

But if we are to dissect the dream‚ÄîAramun did say that if she doesn‚Äôt want to die she needs to run far away. She thinks the land below the cliff would be her safe heaven, out of the reach of the Gods. Maybe she is wrong?  She didn‚Äôt follow Tagon as instructed, but she didn‚Äôt manage to run away like she was told. What does Aramun even mean when he says to run far away? In what land would the God be blind to the actions of men? None. Maybe what she should have done is give her son to Rompit and return to the Asa family or at least Arthdal. Her children were probably the thing she should be running from because they were born when the blue star fell. It seems as long as she has her children or one of the child, she is doomed. Aramun came for the child so maybe he wasn‚Äôt in alignment with the God?? Because he couldn‚Äôt get what he came for he took the father, which would have been able to raise the two children up as a force Arthdal would fear. 

However, I wonder‚Äîif she follows Tagon what would be the outcome? Tagon wouldn‚Äôt kill her. She is from the Asa family and would be a great asset to his team. Plus, he would hold great power over knowing her secret. She would definitely work for him to keep her sons alive.

They weren‚Äôt looking for her. They didn‚Äôt even know she existed until they met her at the market. So ya see‚Äîthey stated to Mu-baek they were looking for someone. This someone could be in Arthdal since they are in Arthdal when they made the statement, but then we see them again while Eun was doing his side quests. So I‚Äôm wondering if they found this someone or if this someone isn‚Äôt in Arthdal. 

I think Yangcha could be a child of Shahati. His attitude fits and seems very out of place in the army. However, the Shahati wouldn‚Äôt have let Yangcha leave at such a young age. He was by Tagon‚Äôs side when Tagon was much younger. 

I‚Äôm not a big fan of Yangcha, so I didn‚Äôt quite follow up on his story. I can‚Äôt ship Tanya and him. But I believe he did grow an ounce of respect towards Tanya.

I‚Äôm having the feeling that the sword is something else and that the twin together is the mirror. What if‚Äîwhat if Tagon is the sword? I know the idea is very far fetch‚Äîbut what if the man who the three things are supposed to go up against isn‚Äôt Tagon? The mysterious civilization hasn‚Äôt even been disclosed, meanwhile their existence is a threat and what they did to Remus is enough to say Arthdal could be destroy in a day.

Or either the sword is mu-baek. He seems to be helping them behind scene. Or‚Äîwhat if the sword is the neathel girl. Hey‚Äîshe has now learned swordsmanship. According to Mu-Baek the neathel can‚Äôt learn swordsmanship, but if one day a neathel did‚Äîit would be unrivaled.

I wanna know who the Neathel is lookin for!! And when the twins will finally met each other!! They ended the first seasons with so much mysteries that I am dying to know; especially who Tanya rode the horse for!!

It has been a while, I don‚Äôt remember the dialogue between Mihol and Taealha. 

According to the untold history and belief of the followers of the original Asa family, Aramun was an Igutu. Since Aramun came from outside, we can assume that maybe he did come from another advance civilization. But if he did come from Mysterious civilization, did they also discriminate against igutu as Aramun never disclosed he was one; or were the mysterious civilization made up of igutu?? It was said Aramun is the son of their God Airuju. That was said in one clip. In another clip, he was said to be sent by Asa Sin who had left Arthdal because of the wars.  The timeline is unclear. But we can definitely say he tick off the ruling Asa family since they killed him. 

As to why the gochiju rock is behind his statue, it is hard to say as we have to question when the statue was created and by who.

Nope. Those r his mountains. He knows it best. He needs to lead them away from his camp site and re-route back. He is faster than any of them. He also need to separate them. They stand no chance one to one. The only way his race can be defeated is because they got no brain. But base on how intelligent the ones we have seen so far, the whole annihilation of the race doesn‚Äôt make sense.

I know right. Which assholes are so blindly rich they would hoard much more than they need? What did they have huh? 2 extra refrigerators? Cause that‚Äôs what my brother-in-law has but he slowly add to his pile, not hoard in one big go. 

People r so selfish. If you need more for a two month period, sure buy. But if you‚Äôre buying for a year worth of food when every other is also buying the same amount? My god, selfish.

Even when I am stocking my pantry before this whole chaos‚Äîcause I heard‚ÄîI only at most take 4 cans of my most favorites. The rest is 2-3. I leave some for other. If there there only 4 on the shelf, I only take half of the four. We shared. When we got two of the rice packs that were left at the Asian store, and another couple came in also wanting rice‚Äîwe offer them one. We should always try to help. If everyone die or your favorite people die, you wouldn‚Äôt want to live either.

Minimum wage are always seen as low, low because someone working minimum wage and don‚Äôt have other asset or revenue will never be able to afford a house and many other stuff. There is a reason for that. 

Personally, I have never seen the job as bad‚Äîjust harsh since the pay aren‚Äôt good. Even when we have everyone educated, someone is still gonna have to bust the table and clean the toilet. Poverty is never gonna be solved‚Äînever.

Not really. It depends on my mood. Sometimes shopping doesn‚Äôt makes me feel better, or even makes me feel worst, but I do it because I have so much options and I could get all it. The consequences could detrimental, but it is easier to guess than the game we call life. 

Sometimes been able to afford is a good feeling and makes me feel a good high until the empty wallet makes me feel miserable. A love and hate thing.
I don‚Äôt even have the time to play

Then you shouldn‚Äôt have date him. Sometimes our relationship have to be determined on the consequences of action taken. If he cares, he would have shut up and leave it and encourages you in other way. But his pride and ego is bigger than your well being.

I get you. Totally do. I would worry sick calling my management office telling them I won‚Äôt be able to make next month rent. 

But working with the public at itself is a risk. Is it worth risking my health to meet short term needs? I could pay my rent for the next coming months‚Äîbut then I would have contacts with several people and several surfaces within those time. Who knows if I‚Äôll become a number and infect my entire family or if my stupid family members who won‚Äôt practice stay at home or social distance eventually kill me. 

If you need someone to chat, I‚Äôm here! I‚Äôll be busy, but I will definitely find the time to response.

Sound me. Sometimes I don‚Äôt wanna help but got to do it because I didn‚Äôt know how to say no. I would suggest talk to yourself, tell yourself it‚Äôs okay. It feels miserable, but one people is less trouble and you did something good for humanity. Then go to sleep or go for a run to get your blood moving.

Maybe you sounded very cold to people. The way you responded? 

I kinda like a lone wolf too. I couldn‚Äôt really join group and feel alone a lot. People tend to always think of me as quiet. I‚Äôm just introverted.

We are always told to do what makes us happy. What if letting go of this world is what makes you happy? Now people began to judge you, don‚Äôt they?

For those who don‚Äôt have these issue‚Äîthey can and will say all kind of shit to belittle our action. They have never been in our shoes. How do you live when you, yourself, don‚Äôt see life as precious?  I can‚Äôt look at my phony neighbors and say life is precious. I can‚Äôt stand to wake up every morning knowing I am gonna go to work 99% of the year, no more than a dog on a leash just allow to choose which color the leash would be. I can‚Äôt stand people saying fake things like ‚Äúbe yourself‚Äù cause you see I can‚Äôt be myself. I was just reported to my Sup today for being a distraction. How? Cause I was quietly humming. Haha. For all the damn noises in our office from printer, to people chatting about tasks, to coworker speaking loudly to customer on the phones, etc‚Äîmy quiet, just one time yesterday and one this morning for less than a minute, some petty idle worker made a complaint. 

I hate this illusion of ‚Äúwork hard and you will see result.‚Äù Work hard. Work hard! Work hard!! The damn American Dream. But I can definitely say, with my wages living in CA and working my butt off doing two jobs‚ÄîI will never be able to afford a house or even if I do I can never make enough to innovate it. Never. Unless things change.

Let‚Äôs exchange your schedule with my schedule for a week please!!!! 

Not much have change for me. I am still working my same schedule of two jobs.

Oh lord. Today my team lead had to come talk to me about ‚Äúhumming.‚Äù Like seriously. I only started yesterday, and it was one yesterday and one this morning less than a minute until I get too busy to even remember to hum‚Äîbut someone already complained. Plus, I was super quiet about it and kept it to my cubicle. I wasn‚Äôt so loud as if I was talking to the person in the next cubicle. 

I am aware of my surrounding and keep it to a minimum, I made it known to the Lead. But how petty can people be? The office is usually noisy and there r several people who are loud when they talk. This person is so petty to nitpick someone like me who is already very careful of my noise level. I should just label this as a personal attack, that this person has something against me. But seriously, I haven‚Äôt step on anyone toes. I am way too busy to do that. 

I feel you. I have worked in management like that before. It was awful. I just keep my mouth shut. I eventually left a year later.

Taking deep breath never quiet works for me and probably for u too. I suggest u take a walk in the woods, a hike etc and watch the plants. They r quiet and rarely show their ‚Äúlove.‚Äù Yet they r alive and definitely knows love and what not. 

If you can and when you‚Äôre financially stable, adopt a pet!
I‚Äôm still working, but I‚Äôm sure my employer won‚Äôt up that at all. We have a union too, but haven‚Äôt heard much from the union. I would love double pay!
was the entire warehouse tested afterward?

I always know that. It‚Äôs why I‚Äôm always struggling with depression doing the thing I would rather not  cause the consequences would be deadly. 

I wanna do things I love to. But I am still working.
Ya all going with sex all the way, night and day. But me...sigh, I am going to work. Salute!

I just had a client who claimed she was served an eviction notice: pay or be evicted. Although it wasn‚Äôt the virus but a medical leave that resulted in this, but if anyone comes down with the virus you bet it, many people will go on medical leave and may not particularly have a home to ‚Äústay‚Äù at or people won‚Äôt be able to make their rent and bills. 

This is my fear, but it is becoming a reality that people won‚Äôt talk about. Idk why, but I am more afraid of what my society would do to me and not the virus.
The color is pretty and mind blowing but knowing what it represents‚Äîfear.

If only. I‚Äôm worry about where our world is gonna go from here on out. If you‚Äôre in salary it doesn‚Äôt matter, but pay per hours will be tough as people loses jobs‚Äîeviction notices, shortages, I‚Äôm afraid of you and you‚Äôre afraid of me, the list go on.

Some people may not have a happy time during these period. It‚Äôs pretty stressful. I hope you‚Äôll pray for the world and find times to watch something funny and laugh. 

Peace
UBI and see if your are eligible for foodstamp and cash aid if you live in America. Temporary assistance is better than nothing. Who knows when the fund will run out though.
You should be pay double!!

Oh no. I am not comparing at all. I am just thinking about my own life and wonder when he‚Äôll show up. Seeing so many cute and adorable couple, I can‚Äôt help thinking of my own life. 

And thanks.

How adorable. 

I am pitful here. I have been through a lot too but I don‚Äôt have anyone loving me in such a way.
Omg. Haha. But depends on how long the virus is around for.

I usually take everything my boss says as feedback for improvement. If it is pretty obvious the boss is just being a jerk‚Äîlearn as much as you can and take a different job. 

Don‚Äôt overthink yourself. Mistake, failure, and not meeting the expectation are ways in which you improve. If you‚Äôre thinking about it and working on improvement, I think you‚Äôre doing well. But I am a stranger and I don‚Äôt know your industry‚Äîtake feedbacks and improvement tips from your boss and coworkers. Plus, do self assessment. If you‚Äôre not doing well this project‚Äîhow can you do better next time? What can you change for the next project?

Hell no. It is so hard to get operators to understand anything. Just lucky, the some operator register the word ‚Äúagent‚Äù or ‚Äú representative.‚Äù

Not all call center are created equal!

Me too. I want to drop everything and just go. I escape reality by thinking of me in another place, time, and period doing the most peaceful thing. Always sees myself in front of a sink, simply prepping morning breakfast while the sun shines through the window in front of the sink. Outside, there is the peaceful view of nature‚Äîknowing I am in peace and harmony. Other times, I see myself sitting in a very clean and white room, in front of a screen doing data. A coffee cup is off to the side. A big screen is to the side. Outside, there are the top of many huge trees. It is very peaceful and I have a sense of purpose. It is home. I feel confidence and a sense of knowing who I am.

It‚Äôs the fact that you could be one in many that succeeded. Never hurt to try, but being flexible is the right and smart way to think. People need to understand that sometimes they have to give up time to do the things they rather not so that they could later do the things they love.

This is why the ideal of being equal is BS and the idea of combating poverty is an illusion. We will never be equal. Poverty will never be gone because it is part of the system. The system created what we called poverty today. Many people will never make more than the minimum wages and will have to put in extra hours to afford living‚Äîthe hidden slaves. Some people will afford a little above the minimum‚Äîthe indenture servant never realizing they are in debt for life. Some people will make enough to be well off; shouting for equal opportunities and to stop poverty, never truly bothering to see what created the issues‚Äîthem. Few will make it to the top richness and other were born bath in silvers and golds‚Äîthey will never care and even if they do, their compassion will never reach down. They will give in the name of charity‚Äîgiving backpacks and creating pantry for the poor. Their solutions only further the problems. In the end, most will never learn to fish in the big sea. Although most have fish in the faked pond‚Äîsome have succeeded and some hand failed.
Well said.

Never quite consider myself an artist but I love doing things with my hands. I just love it. I love ceramic the most. I just do. The problem is. I don‚Äôt have a lot of free time. I work like a workaholic. 8 hours in the day for my day job. Another 6 hours during the night, busing my butt at my business to make some cash on the side. Any free time is to sleep and read to distract me from reality. I‚Äôm a working slave. Been doing this since college and still is doing it. I could never afford a couple months off. Haven‚Äôt got a real, real vacation over 7 years. Don‚Äôt get me start on my depleting saving. 

I wish I could also afford a couple months off work and won‚Äôt struggle financially. Life sucks as it is. When I enter the work force as an adult, all my dreams slowly wither away. I feel like an empty shell of what I once was. It‚Äôs just sad.

A coworker told me I was very cautious in my behaviors. Which of course I have to. Say the wrong thing and I could be fired. Be too out spoken and I would be the first to go should the company decide to downsize. 

My supervisor always said, I could go to her if I am overwhelm‚Äîthat really depend.
T.T
No I am not quiet. I don‚Äôt say anything cause I don‚Äôt have much option or knowledge about the subject.
Mr cleaner doesn‚Äôt work for me. It‚Äôs either comet or bleach gel.
Sometimes hard work needs the additional words work smart. Work hard, and also work smart!!
This sum up me.
A story about your love stories isn‚Äôt bad.
Good luck.
College life is like that. Maybe you can do one about all the stupid stories and actions of you and your drunk friend. But make sure to tell it in a way where people laugh.
Congratulation!!
Haha. Yes, we get so lost in our identity as parents we often forget we have on many hats.
A hero is never considered fallen until the deeds he did are not considered heroic.

If the movie has nothing, who would watch it? Might as well say a movie about the most mundane things in life. But hey, the real fact is‚Äîhow the negotiation went. 

Sounds interesting

Love it that you r doing everything you can. Are you in the USA? So far, I haven‚Äôt heard of such thing as patients buying medical tools for their own services. Usually, the hospital would have the stuff needed then bill the patient. If you live in USA, most hospital should have Medicaid assistant. 

Don‚Äôt move her unless the doctor say so, but if you‚Äôre switching hospital it shouldn‚Äôt be a problem if it is in the city or even some cities away. The problem would be in case something flare up while on the drive.

the hospital is asking you provide what? Liver medication? You mean medication for her liver won‚Äôt be covered by insurance??

I honestly would say, talk to your doctor. They would have the best knowledge. If you feel one isn‚Äôt good, ask to switch doctor.
I can think of what makes me happy. But no matter how I think about, idk how to make it happen. I can work and work but the system will eat away my $$. I can only daydream right now.
So. You‚Äôre saying healthily people die easier than other with lower health? So what we were told are wrong? Confuse.

Long life battle. 

But I am managing. I just don‚Äôt feel like working. I just need an extra day.

You fall between the cracks. If you are at my local county‚Äôs employment and social service center, I would give you a list of pick up free food sites‚Äîfood that would feed you today and kill you in ten years. By the time you‚Äôre ready to die, you would have exactly and barely over 10 years of suffering‚Äîmaybe 20 years? Also which by then, you would have throw enough $$ into the health system, to be worthy of as a sick and ill assets of the state. 

I get you. I work two jobs and have sugar ‚Äúcraving‚Äù problems. I barely have time for me. Any time I got, I spent daydreaming of getting away from here. The earliest I have slept on a work day was 12am. Sometimes, I won‚Äôt get home till 11pm. When I come home at 6pm, it‚Äôs constant cooking for the lazy piglets at home that are way too old, and prepping my lunch for the following day. 

I am truly tired of this life. I work very hard. But learn I have to work smart‚Äîbut sometimes working smart is stressful because it put me in position I would rather not be in. But if I don‚Äôt take such a position, I won‚Äôt get a raise. Sigh. I feel old and weary. I have so much ache and sore‚ÄîI can look at an elder and wish I won‚Äôt live too long.

I guess it is not about finding a good part about oneself, but recognize one good part‚Äîor at least a decent part. 

The power to make it great depend highly on opportunities at the right time and right place. Love your optimism, but personally, the more I age the more I feel I have lost myself.
Everybody lives like that. That is how life is.
O.o how did you manage to not stink?!

Haha. You should hate the world. Being on welfare in the USA is pretty good compare to many parts of the world where welfare isn‚Äôt even a thing. You either slave your time away for three plain meals a day or you starve. You choose. I guess, there are more meaning when people actually are starving.
Wow. A real pig in the city.

Society makes it cool for young boys to want to date and screw around with an older woman that has the hour glass figure.

The dominant culture yells rape, but the smaller communities yells manly. Yup.

I think having kids is amazing. But please do so when you‚Äôre financially stable, is being responsible, and knows your priority. There are so many parents out there that doesn‚Äôt give an F. Just cause someone have a kid, doesn‚Äôt mean they will change from selfish scumbag to a compassionate being.

There are real game addiction! My brothers were at one point super addicted and all they do is game, game, and game some more. They were freeloading, not helping around the house‚Äînada. Free as a damn corrupted king. It got to the point where my mom had to take away the internet and used it to bargain when and what they would do. It took them a long time to kinda do something in real life. 

Everyone keep telling me boys are slow to mature. While I‚Äôm saying, hell no.

Wonder Woman...she says good lines but some of her battle actions are so pathetic. If she can jump walls and go high jump why would she need the men to be a kick off stand. Total BS. Put them men to better use as they should be. Let them all have meaningful role. 

Same with Ghost Buster too. My bro and I was discussing this advancing the fem and woman rule the world agenda in the film. The only male guy isn‚Äôt much of a guy nor a character.

Haha‚ÄîI have a slight fear of dogs. Was chased when I was little by a big black dog. The dog probably meant good, and thought we were playing a game of run and chase. But little me never took it that way. We were not raised around dogs and knew nothing about their behaviors. I volunteered once at a dog shelter, but quit the first day. My interaction with dogs was so little, I didn‚Äôt have the background knowledge to help me. I was more afraid of them than I thought. Haha‚Äîsince them, no dog for me until my sister bought her dog home. I managed well with him because he was very timid at first, and overtime I learned his behaviors.

Am glad you adopted yours from a shelter. Too many families buy puppies and later abandon them.

It would hurt my financial budget. Plus landlord doesn‚Äôt allow pets. My sister used to have a Pomeranian. He got sick a lot. Each time, the bill is paid through my pocket. 

I have never gotten a pet because the responsibilities and housing requirement. But thanks.
Good that you have your doggo or SO. I have no one who would pick me up. Just me trying to keep it all together.
I‚Äôm not afraid of death. I am afraid of pain. I am afraid of the things I can‚Äôt describe in words. That is my fear.

I get you. I took care of my ailing father for years and live a toxic family lives for years. When the family finally separated from my father, I find it hard to adjust, to understand what happiness and peace are. Almost everyday I wake up in the blue wondering ‚Äúwhat now?‚Äù

Exactly. I hate worrying in class if what I say would come back to reflect badly on me or my image and so I don‚Äôt say anything in class at all. 

I drove home worrying what I appear like to people. Overthinking and replaying scenarios in my mind.
They could have let him die differently.
